00072 String
00073 LoadDataSourceStdin::get_header()
00074 {
00075   String header = "";
00076   if (m_header_fname != "") {
00077     std::ifstream in(m_header_fname.c_str());
00078     getline(in, header);
00079   }
00080   else {
00081     getline(m_fin, header);
00082   }
00083 
00084   return header;
00085 }
